Presented by Trevor Brown and Ben Fink since 2008, a weekly specialist music show on Eastside Radio, featuring new music, old music, field recordings, interviews and live concerts.

It airs weekly in Sydney 12pm-1.30pm, on 89.7fm or on eastsidefm.org

You can listen back to previous shows here.

https://eastsidefm.org/foundsoundslosthorizons/
